00038                 {
00039                         const popupmenu& pm = submenus[menuid];
00040                         EnableMenuItem(pm.handle, pm.ids[itemid], (enable ? MF_BYCOMMAND|MF_ENABLED : MF_BYCOMMAND|MF_GRAYED));
00041                 }
